name: Impotent Chicken
description:
Sneak away from the hen house and steal an egg from your local supermarket.

You are a chicken which can't lay eggs anymore. But since you the farmer would slaughter you if he found out you have to find another way to stay alive in the hen house. The other hens also won't help you out so you decide to steal an egg from the nearest supermarket.

also hold jump to glide btw :|
